tasks.openapi: deno run -A npm:@openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i https://api.artifactsmmo.com/openapi.json -g typescript-fetch -o ./api --additional-properties=importFileExtension=.ts,basePath='https://api.artifactsmmo.com'
tasks.dev: deno task valid && deno run --env -A --watch main.ts
tasks.start: deno task openapi && deno run --env -A main.ts
